column4: I followed this tutorial: http://pastebin.com/smTbBUYV to set my ubuntu server up as a router...everything is working except my client pc's cant reach the internet...
they are getting an ip from the dhcp3 on the router..and show the gateway as 192.168.0.201 (eth1 internal nic)
but cant get to the internet at all
i know it is a routing issue
the clients are getting an ip from dhcp3 on the router...and show the gateway being 192.168.0.201 (which is the router)...but i cna't ping the internet NOR the router from the client pcs
what does dig google.com  give you.  does dns work?
i don't have any dns set up on my router... can i just use 8.8.8.8 (google's)
without dns you have no internet
well what was in the resolv.conf
yes if he can't ping his dns then dns is not his problem
but I don't know what error he got when he tried
maybe a dns problem?  how long does dig google.com take,  maybe winbind problem?
